content:
Here's a possible rewrite of the introduction:

Alternative dispute resolution (ADR) offers a more efficient and cost-effective way to resolve legal disputes outside of traditional court proceedings. In this article, we'll explore the importance of ADR and how it can benefit homeowners and builders in NSW, Australia. Specifically, we'll compare two popular forms of ADR - mediation and arbitration - and explain the key differences between them. By the end of this article, you'll have a better understanding of which ADR method may be most suitable for your needs.
